page.title: 04THE RIVER THAMES
page.content:
The River Thames has many uses in Goring and Streatley.Boats that have been hired from Henley-on-Thames or Maidenhead go cruising up and down the river.as people go on holiday. Walking along the river you can see people fishing,cows grazing on the water meadows also you can see many different ducks.
Goring and Streatley has many attractions such as the Swan Hotel. The Swan also has a barge Restaurant built on a concrete base,with two decks and a wine cellar.The Swan was once owned by Danny La Rue who is now a famous comedian.
